bill_title: revise and remove certain segments of the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise and remove certain segments of the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-159 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-159. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Davison, Hanson, McCook, and Minnehaha counties : (1) From a point on State Highway 37 near the north quarter line of section twenty-seven, township one hundred three north, range sixty west, thence easterly via Mitchell and Montrose to State Highway 19 near the southeast corner of section eight, township one hundred two north, range fifty-two west; (2) From a point on State Highway 19 at Humboldt near the southwest corner of section ten, township one hundred two north, range fifty-two west, thence easterly via Humboldt and Hartford to Interstate Highway 29 near the southeast corner of section twenty-five, township one hundred two north, range fifty west . From a point on Interstate Highway 90 Business Loop in Mitchell, thence easterly via Mitchell, Salem, Montrose, Humboldt, and Hartford to Interstate Highway 29. Section 2. That § 31-4-185 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-185. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Lyman, Brule, and Davison counties: (1) From a point on Interstate Highway 90 at Oacoma in section twenty-four, township one hundred four north, range seventy-two west , thence northeasterly via Oacoma and Chamberlain to State Highway 50 near the west quarter corner of section fifteen, township one hundred four north, range seventy-one west ; (2) From a point on Interstate Highway 90 north of the southwest corner of section twenty-eight, township one hundred three north, range sixty west, thence north and east via Mitchell to State Highway 37 west of the northeast corner of section twenty-eight, township one hundred three north, range sixty west at Mitchell exit number 332, thence north to State Highway 38 and west via Mitchell to State Highway 37 . Section 3. That § 31-4-226 be repealed. 31-4-226. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Minnehaha County: From a point on State Highway 11 in Brandon north of the southwest corner of section thirty-five, township one hundred two north, range forty-eight west, thence east via Brandon and Valley Springs to the Minnesota state line near the northeast corner of section three, township one hundred one north, range forty-seven west.

Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
